scripts.dev: concurrently "yarn workspace server run dev" "yarn workspace client run start"
scripts.build: yarn workspaces foreach -pv run build && cp -r packages/client/build packages/server
scripts.deploy: scp -r {dist,build} qbhub:~/qbhub-server/ && ssh qbhub 'cd ~/qbhub-server && git pull && yarn install && pm2 restart qbhub'
